headline.print_headline: Former Connecticut Governor Secretly Paid to Advise Congressional Campaign, Staff Testify
headline.main: Former Connecticut Governor Secretly Paid to Advise Congressional Campaign, Staff Testify

lead_paragraph: Two campaign managers for a 2012 congressional candidate testified on Wednesday that former Connecticut Governor John Rowland, on trial for campaign violations, worked as a top-level adviser while being paid through a phony contract with the candidate's husband's business.
